version_description:
I know adverts are annoying - that's why MyJD now has no advertising
Turn on/off in-app warning/info notifications

I know adverts are annoying - that's why MyJD now has no advertising
Turn on/off in-app warning/info notifications

Thanks to Gurwan Hunt, MyJD is now available in French!

We've also added a little Apple Watch app so you can check the progress of your downloads from your wrist.

Other than that, MyJD now works better on iOS 13.
